text: <@U02F8TTPU>: what a shame! I was hoping it would be the thing that made me buy one

A camera that can grab 100 billion fps. Yeah, you read that right. The demo video is a slo-mo of a single photon reflecting off a mirror. <http://motherboard.vice.com/read/the-fastest-camera-ever-created-will-be-used-to-study-invisibility-cloaks>

attachments.text: You can watch exactly how light interacts with objects using a camera that captures 100 billion frames per second.

text: <@U026NB2U2>: I wonder where they got the name, and if it has anything to do with Chomsky
